title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2375.12 - Communications within the division
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2375.12 - Communications within the division

State Regulations

Tax policies and interpretations are communicated throughout
the division by word, hardcopy and machine sensible formats. These methods
include meetings, training sessions, memoranda, electronic mail, directives, rulings, procedures, programs, guidelines and manuals. Intra-division
communications have no legal force or effect, nor true precedential value. They
are binding only to the extent that affected personnel of the division are
required to abide by their provisions until otherwise
notified. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
2375.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
